name: The Secret War of Lisa Simpson
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Richard Appel
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: After a prank destroys half the town, Bart is shipped away to military school. Lisa, seeking a challenge, decides to enroll with him, but is faced with discrimination as the school's only girl cadet.
